title: I just spent 195rp on a champion shard unintentionally
body: I wanted to buy one so i could have lvl-ed up on of my champions to lvl 6 but i miss clicked and bought it with rp, and i cant refund it now, since the system won let me. Can i somehow get a refund or its just lost now?

replies.body: We don't generally refund hextech crafting content, but we prefer to review each case individually anyway.  Maybe we can work something out, if you have any refund tokens or haven't used the content yet.  These are not guarantees, but I'm trying to think of ways we can make help! Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can do anything for ya!
I asked the support, but sadly he couldnt help, so i opened it and even that was unlucky. It was a singed champion shard :/ Thanks for trying to help anyways.
